Package model.interfaces

Interface Player

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Player>
    public interface Player
extends java.lang.Comparable<Player>
    Assignment interface for FP representing the player
 to be implemented by SimplePlayer class with the following constructor:
          public SimplePlayer(String id, String playerName, int initialPoints)
 
 NOTE: player id is unique and if another player with same id is added it replaces the previous player
    Author:
    Caspar Ryan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Used to compare order based on player id ascending for <, > or equality See API docs of java.lang.Comparable<T> for details

        setBet
        

        boolean setBet​(int bet)
        

        NOTE: must use resetBet() for 0 bet since not valid for this method
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        bet - - the bet in points
        

        Returns:
        

        true if bet is greater than 0 and player has sufficient points to place the bet

        toString
        

        java.lang.String toString()
        

        @return 
          a human readable String that lists the values of this Player 
          including their last result
      
          e.g. "Player: id=1, name=The Shark, bet=100, points=900, RESULT .. 38" 
          (see OutputTrace.pdf)
 
        

        

        Overrides:
        

        toString in class java.lang.Object
